Author: gentlerose
Text: sounds like she didn’t just “have an eating disorder” when she was young but is still suffering from one... the fact that she’s based her identity off of being a “super skinny” girl and is THANKFUL for the negative impacts of her disorder on her health is... off... to say the least

Author: peignoir_fairy
Text: Oh GOD [tw] but there was a girl I went to school with who was hospitalised for ana when we were about 15 and we are mid 20s now but on a night out before we went to uni she literally said “I’m glad I had an eating disorder when I was young bc it stunted my growth and I think I’ll always be like super skinny now you know? like I’ll be a skinny girl in the club at uni” and I was SO triggered and literally didn’t know what to say and now my disordered adult ass is jealous of her disordered teenage ass
